titleStmt.title: The proclamation promoted, or An hue-and-cry and inquisition after treason and blood; upon the inhumane and horrid murder of that noble knight, impartial justice of peace, and zealous Protestant, Sir Edmondberry Godfry of Westminster. ; An hasty poem.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J.L. at the Blew-Bell in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: In verse. First line of text: "O Murder! Murder! let this Shreik fly round,".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
